prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that resembles a shark with vibrant blue and yellow patterns.
Generate a fierce aquatic creature that has sharp fins and a sleek design, perfect for the ocean.
Imagine a Pokemon that combines speed and strength, showcasing a fierce predator in vibrant colors.
Show me a Pokemon with a streamlined body and a powerful jaw, ready to hunt in the sea.
Make a design for an aquatic Pokemon with striking features and a dynamic swimming style.
I want to see a Pokemon that embodies the essence of the ocean, with a bold color palette.
Design a shark-like Pokemon that exudes confidence and agility, with an eye-catching appearance.
